description:
Since Fear won`t join the Vivolio Families, it seems that Alice is retaliating by serial-killing innocent people. The class president, Kirika, is unable to join Haruaki and the others on the hunt for Alice, but she does share a chilling secret with him...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Sadist Is Nowhere to Be Found
嗜虐者は何処にもいない
